alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 6:30PM MDT until May 24 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Garfield County in northeastern Montana... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 630 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Edwards, or 21 miles southwest of Jordan, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Edwards and Steve Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
